articles.title: Mourning begins in Texas where more than 170 are still missing from flash floods
articles.description: In Texas, at least 120 people have died from flash floods, with over 170 still missing. The search for victims continues along extensive riverbanks and debris. The floods forced families to make urgent escapes, and the community is now holding prayer services to mourn the losses.

articles.title: Trump announces 30% tariffs against EU, Mexico to begin August 1
articles.description: President Donald Trump has announced 30% tariffs on imports from the European Union and Mexico, set to begin on August 1. These tariffs are part of his broader strategy to address trade imbalances and are expected to impact major trade partners significantly.

articles.title: New Report Shows One-Third of U.S. Counties Lack a Full-Time Local Journalist
articles.description: A report from Rebuild Local News and Muck Rack reveals that over 1,000 U.S. counties lack even one full-time local journalist. This shortage raises concerns about the state of local journalism and its impact on community information and democracy.
